ai_heading: Describe your dashboard, and we'll build it.
ai_description: Skip manual setup. Tell us what you want to track, and our AI builds a full dashboard for you.
ai_placeholder: Ask AI to help build your dashboard... e.g. " Generate a dashboard showing vulnerabilities"
template_standard_description: Track website traffic, user behavior, and conversion rates
template_sales_description: Monitor revenue, pipeline, and sales team performance
template_customer_support_description: Track tickets, response times, and satisfaction scores
manual_title: Start building your dashboard manually by adding a widget.
